message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique item that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $110. It's a great compromise, considering the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you consider that price?
I understand you're getting close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $105. It's the lowest I can go without losing money on the deal.
I'm close to my target, but I can do $100. Can you meet me at that price?
